__e: The only strangers we get are tourists. We get 'em all the time, stopping for gas, a bite to eat. That's all.
We got plenty of tourists with cars in the shop.
Now, remember, we're just sightseers and picture-takers.
From now on, we are just two tourists in an airport with the heaviest rucksack I've ever seen.
But we're walking around the city like tourists all the time.
